text: Northern Cypriot identity cards are issued by the government of the self- declared state of Northern Cyprus for the purpose of identitification. It can be used as a travel document to enter Turkeyhttp://www.mfa.gov.tr/countries- whose-citizens-are-allowed-to-enter-turkey-with-their-national-id_s.en.mfa and Cyprus (only at the land border with North Cyprus). ==See also== * Northern Cypriot passport * Cypriot identity card ==References== Northern Cyprus Category:Turkish Cypriot law
title: Northern Cypriot identity card
